description: The respondent shall deliver and install branded, pre-fabricated, personal storage lockers. The brand is to be determined, however, the supplier must have a supply chain of high-quality off-the-shelf products that can be easily distributed and installed across Canada.
full_summary:
### EP922-231468 File Storage Cabinets

* **Reference Number**: WS4030667886-Doc4069118829
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4030667886
* **Publication Date**: August 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 29, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Description**: The procurement seeks the delivery and installation of prefabricated personal storage lockers.

**Trade Agreements**: This tender opportunity is open to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Regions of Delivery**: Alberta

**End User Entities**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)

**Contact Information**:
- Kristen Schultz, 
- Email: [kristen.schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristen.schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Status

*   **Status**: Expired
*   **noticeURL**: [Link to the tender notice](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17184724)

### Tender Submission

To access the tender notice and submit a bid, please visit the SAP Ariba platform. There are no fees associated with accessing the information or submitting a bid.

Note: All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date and time. Late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
